licence_overview:
Specific risk material (SRM) can only be removed at slaughterhouses or cutting plants approved by the [Food Standards Agency (FSA).](http://www.food.gov.uk/ "Food Standards Agency"){:rel="external"}

*[SRM]: Specific risk material
licence_short_description: The Food Standards Agency gives approval for slaugherhouses to remove specific risk material (SRM) in England.
overview: Your slaughterhouse must be authorised by the Food Standards Agency to remove specific risk material (SRM)
title: Specific risk material authorisation (England)
